participant_1.name: Claire
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, Claire loves the outdoors and enjoys a variety of activities. She's an enthusiastic supporter of sports and enjoys sharing her passions with others.
participant_1.background: I live in rural Wisconsin. I have an older brother who plays football in the NFL. My favorite food is popcorn. I like to snowboard. I like to ride horses.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and resilient, Jordan is dedicated to his craft of comic creation. He is optimistic despite facing challenges and enjoys expressing himself through art.
participant_2.background: I've started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers. I've been rejected several times and thought of giving up with this. And also love drawing. I love comics.

content.text: I love drawing and creating my own comics.
That's so cool! I love to draw too. Do you post your comics online?
I haven't yet, but I'm thinking about it. I'm just not sure if I'm ready for the public's opinion yet.
You should totally post them! I'm sure people would love them.
I also like to snowboard and ride horses. Do you do any winter sports?
I don't really do winter sports, but I love to watch them! I'm always cheering on the skiers and snowboarders at the Olympics.
Me too! I love watching the winter Olympics. It's so exciting to see all the different countries competing in their favorite winter sports.
I know, right? It's so much fun to see everyone come together and celebrate the winter games.
I'm from rural Wisconsin, so I grew up skiing and snowboarding. It's something I've always loved to do.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to go skiing in Wisconsin. I've heard it's beautiful there.
It is! The snow is always so powdery and soft. It's the perfect place to go skiing.
I'm definitely going to have to go there someday.
You should! I'm sure you'd love it.
